cc.ageErrorMessage: Please enter the age between 15 and 80 !
cc.weightErrorMessage: Please enter the weight between 30 and 350 kilograms!
cc.heightErrorMessage: Please enter the height between 90 and 250 centimeters!
cc.activity-p4: Very active (hard exercise/sports 6-7 days a week)
cc.activity-p5: Extra active (very hard exercise/sports & physical job or 2x training)

motivation.remember: Remember, if anyone can do it, so can you
motivation.leonardo-p1: It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them.
motivation.leonardo-p2: They went out and happened to things.
motivation.einstein-p1: There are only two ways to live your life.
motivation.einstein-p2: One is as though nothing is a miracle.
motivation.einstein-p3: The other is as though everything is a miracle.
motivation.tesla-p1: I could only achieve success in my life through self-discipline
motivation.tesla-p2: and I applied it until my wish and my will became one.

lifestyle.support: We are here to support your way into building a better version of you

faq.doubt: When in doubt, observe and ask questions.
faq.certain: When certain, observe at length and ask many more questions.

contact.contact-p1: Feel free to leave any suggestions on how we should improve our website,
contact.contact-p2: also let us know what you think of it so far.
contact.contact-p3: In the future we are looking forward to adding new features

footer.org: We are a nonprofit organization that has a goal to show
footer.mindset: how anyone can unlock their true potential with the right mindset

cf.name: Full name
cf.thanks: Thank you for submitting the form!
